title: Git Merge
mainDescription: Consider the below example. We have the master pointing at 51bfea0. We need to merge it with awesome_branch.
We will use the <-- git merge --> command. If any conflicts arise, they need to be resolved and git will let you know.
Once merged, the head and the awesome_branch point to the same hash.
If awesome_branch is not needed anymore we can just delete it directly with <-- git branch -d --> command.
postDescription: git merge is used day in and day out in real environment and is one of the most useful tool.
